document_data.mainbody:
ecret of the Trees was one of the specialty dishes of the Dryads Dreams, the only festhall in Mosstone, Tethyr.
The Secret of the Trees was a sophisticated and mouthwatering dish. The Secret consisted out of frothed roasted garlic, toasted walnuts, and local wild mushrooms from the Forest of Tethir, served on sweet stewed peppers.
Secret of the Trees was served at the Dryads Dreams in the mid-to-late-14 century DR. The dish was praised by Volothamp Geddarm in one of his published travel guides.
